Sentencas: The Solid Oxide Fuel Cell (SOFC) is modelled and optimised for the tri-generation hybrid system fed by biogas produced from hospital waste.
Titulo: Economic optimisation and thermodynamic modelling of SOFC tri-generation system fed by biogas

Sentencas: A 50 kW tubular SOFC combined with a chiller, Heat Recovery Steam Generator (HRSG), combustion chamber and required equipment in this study.
Titulo: Economic optimisation and thermodynamic modelling of SOFC tri-generation system fed by biogas

Sentencas: The system provides 50% of total electricity required using the produced biogas and also provides the whole cooling load of the hospital using an absorption chiller.
Titulo: Economic optimisation and thermodynamic modelling of SOFC tri-generation system fed by biogas

Sentencas: Further, an economic optimisation is carried out.
Titulo: Economic optimisation and thermodynamic modelling of SOFC tri-generation system fed by biogas

Sentencas: The principal goal is to give a comprehensive perspective on the affordability of using the proposed system by considering economic parameters along with thermodynamic principles.
Titulo: Economic optimisation and thermodynamic modelling of SOFC tri-generation system fed by biogas

Sentencas: The single-objective optimisation is performed by genetic algorithm.
Titulo: Economic optimisation and thermodynamic modelling of SOFC tri-generation system fed by biogas

Sentencas: The results indicate that under the acquired optimum conditions, the proposed system can be economically affordable in long term and will result in net profit of approximately US $ 874,200 annually.
Titulo: Economic optimisation and thermodynamic modelling of SOFC tri-generation system fed by biogas
